description: REM RDI at 3% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in REM sleep associated with >= 3% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of REM sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp3 + hrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + oarbp3 + oarop3 ) / minremp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall rem RDI at 3% oxygen desaturation
